en: The sun is shining
It's a lovely day
A perfect morning
For a kid to play
But you're got lots
Of bills to pay
What can you do?
Your work real hard
And the pay's real low
And every hour
Goes oh, so slow
And at the end of the day
There's no where to go
But home to Avenue Q!
You live on Avenue Q!
You're friends do too.
You are twenty-two
And you live on Avenue Q!
My parents must have thought they had a crazy kid
zh: 我父母一定认为他们有一个疯狂的孩子

en: 'Cause I was one of those kids who always knew what I wanted
zh: 只因我总是明白我想要什么

en: They took me down to the airport to see all the planes departing
zh: 他们带我到机场去看那起程的飞机

en: Watching them fly something inside of me was starting
zh: 它们的远航唤醒了我的内心

en: I was eight when I told them that I'd be a pilot
zh: 那年我八岁，我告诉他们我要成为一名飞行员

en: But I was too young and too short
zh: 但我太过年轻，太过矮小

en: and there were no female captains
zh: 并且这世上从未出现过女飞行员

en: and my dad said, "be patient" he said, "just see what happens"
zh: 我爸爸对我说：“耐心点，等等看会发生些什么。”

en: But I took my first lesson came down from the sky
zh: 我上了飞向天空的第一堂课

en: and told my father I'd fly for the rest of my life
zh: 随后对我爸说我将用我的余生去飞行

en: And I got my first job flying for a mortician
zh: 我在殡葬业得到了第一份飞行的工作

en: in a tiny bonanza, just a corpse and me
zh: 小小的“富豪”机舱里，只有尸体和我

en: Five dollars an hour for flying dead bodies
zh: 运送尸体只有每小时五美元

en: I had to climb over their faces just to get to my seat
zh: 为来到我的座位我不得不爬过他们

en: And suddenly the wheels lift off
the ground is falling backwards
I am suddenly alive
Suddenly I'm in the cockpit
zh: 突然间，我坐进了驾驶舱

en: Suddenly everything's changed
Suddenly I'm not too young or too short
zh: 突然间，我不再年轻，不再矮小

en: and the passengers in the back don't complain
zh: 而后面的乘客还不会抱怨

en: Suddenly I'm flying company charters
zh: 突然间，我获得了商飞执照

en: Suddenly everything's high
zh: 突然间，一切变得令人欢欣鼓舞

en: Suddenly there's nothing in between me and the sky
zh: 我与天空之间也不再有什么阻碍！

en: American Airlines had the prettiest planes
zh: 美国航空公司有最棒的飞机

en: So I applied as a flight engineer
zh: 所以我向他们申请成为随机工程师

en: But the World War II pilots, they all complained
zh: 但是那些二战飞行员总是抱怨

en: They said, "girls shouldn't be in the cockpit"
zh: 他们说：“女人不应该在驾驶舱”

en: "Hey lady, hey baby, hey! Why don't you grab us a drink?"
zh: “嘿，小姐，宝贝！为什么不去帮我捎杯喝的？”

en: And the flight attendants weren't my friends back then
zh: 那些在后面不友善的空服员说：

en: and they said, "Are you better than us, do you think?"
But I kept getting hired
And the World War II crew, they retired
zh: 随后那些二战飞行员退休

en: And the girls all thought much higher of me
zh: 随后那些女孩对我刮目相看

en: 1986 the first female American captain in history
zh: 1986年，我成为美国历史上第一位女机长

en: Suddenly I'm in the cockpit
zh: 突然间，我可以坐进驾驶舱

en: Suddenly I've got my wings
zh: 突然间我成为了美国航空的机长

en: Suddenly all of those pilots protested me
zh: 突然间，所有的抗拒我的飞行员

en: Well, they can get their own drinks
zh: 呵，他们可以自己去拿喝的

en: Suddenly there's no one saying, "Stay grounded"
zh: 突然间，不再有人对我说“脚踏实地”

en: Looking down passing them by
zh: 我向下看着他们的走过

en: Suddenly there's nothing in between me and the sky
zh: 突然间，我与天空之间不再有什么阻碍

en: Suddenly I've got an all female crew
zh: 突然间，我拥有了全体女性机组

en: The news talked, it made headlines across the world
zh: 新闻都在谈论，这成了世界的头条

en: Suddenly it stopped
No one saying, "You can't" or "You won't"
zh: 没有人再说“你不行”或“你不能”

en: or "You know you're not anything 'cause you're a girl"
zh: 或“你知道你什么都不是，只因你是女的”

en: Suddenly I'm getting married
and we're putting pins on the map where we've flown
zh: 我们在地图上把我们飞过的地方扎上图钉

en: Suddenly I am a mother
and suddenly shocked at how much they've grown
zh: 并且惊讶于他们成长的速度

en: Suddenly I'm wondering how my parents would feel
zh: 突然间，我好奇我的父母看到

en: seeing me teaching men to be pilots
zh: 如今我在教男人成为一名飞行员会怎么想

en: 'Cause suddenly I am a senior instructor
zh: 因为如今我已成为一名高级导师

en: and somehow I'm 51
Suddenly I'm flying Paris to Dallas
zh: 飞着巴黎至达拉斯航线

en: Across The Atlantic and feeling calm
zh: 横跨大西洋，并且心如止水

en: When suddenly someone on air to air traffic says
zh: 直到有人突然在空中交通通讯中说：

en: "At 8:46 there's been a terrorist action"
zh: “在今早八点四十六，发生了一场恐怖袭击……”

en: And the one thing I loved more than anything
zh: 我对它的爱超过世间的任何感情

en: was used as the bomb
Suddenly I'm in a hotel
Suddenly something has died
zh: 突然间，某种东西不复存在

en: Suddenly there's something in between me and the sky
zh: 突然间，我与天空之间又重新充满了阻碍……

en: On the edge of the world or wherever we are
zh: 在世界边缘或者谁知道我们在哪

en: We are – we are – we are on the edge
zh: 我们——我们——我们坐立不安

en: Is there something - I need to do something
zh: 有没有什么事可做——我得做点什么

en: To keep me from thinking of all those scenes on the tube
zh: 好不让我去想电视上的那些画面

en: I need something to do – 'cause I can't watch the news
zh: 我得做点什么——因为我不忍再看新闻了

en: No, I can't watch the news anymore
Make me a channel of your peace
Where there is hatred
Let me bring your love
Where there is injury
Your pardon, Lord
And where there's doubt
True faith in you
Where there's despair in life
Let me bring hope
Where there is darkness, only light
And where there's sadness, ever joy
Stop the world
Take a picture
Try to capture
To ensure this moment lasts
We're still in it,
but in a minute
That's the limit
And this present will be past
So here we are
Where the world has come together
So here she will be
In this picture, forever
Seize the moment
But the minute he goes you're alone, and it's through
zh: 但当他离开你便孤身一人，这一切就结束了

en: Pinch yourself
Tell yourself:
You're just dreaming, that means he'll forget about you
zh: 他很快就会忘了你，你只是在做梦

en: But here we are
Where the continents once crashed together
Before they went their separate ways forever, so
zh: 然后它们又永远分离，所以

en: On the North-East tip of North America
On an island called Newfoundland
zh: 一座名叫纽芬兰的海岛上

en: There's an airport.
It used to be one of the biggest airports in the world
zh: 曾经是全世界最大的机场之一

en: And next to it is a town called Gander.
zh: 与它毗邻的是一个叫做甘德的小镇

en: Welcome to the Rock if you come from away
zh: 欢迎来巨石，如果你自远方来

en: You probably understand about a half of what we say
zh: 我们的口音你大概很难听明白

en: They say no man's an island, but an island makes a man
zh: 他们说无人是孤岛，但是海岛造就人

en: That mornin' I'm in the classroom
It's our first day back and the school buses are on strike!
zh: 这是开学第一天，校车司机们在闹罢工

en: So, I'm covering for Annette who's running late.
zh: 所以，我在替迟到的安妮特代课

en: Welcome to the Rock!
An Islander. I am an Islander.
zh: 我是个岛民，我是海岛住民

en: I'm an Islander. I am an Islander.
zh: 我是个岛民，我家在岛屿

en: You are here
At the start of a moment
On the edge of the world
Where the river meets the sea
Here
On the edge of the Atlantic
On an island in between
There and here
Welcome to the fog
Welcome to the trees
To the ocean and the sky
And whatever's in between
To the one's who've left
You're never truly gone
A candle's in the window
And a kettle's always on
When the sun is coming up
And the world has come ashore
If you're hoping for a harbour
Then you'll find an open door
In the winter, from the water
Through whatever's in the way
To the one's who have come from away
End of May or early June
This picture-perfect afternoon we shared
zh: 我们共度了如画般美妙的下午

en: Drive the winding country road
zh: 我们驱车穿过崎岖蜿蜒的羊肠小道

en: Grab a scoop at à La Mode
And then we're there
An open field that's framed with trees
zh: 一望无垠的田野，树影斜阳

en: We pick a spot and shoot the breeze
zh: 我们选择了个地方开始闲聊

en: Like buddies do
Quoting songs by our favorite bands
zh: 哼着我们最爱乐队的歌

en: Telling jokes no one understands
zh: 讲着没人理解懂的小笑话

en: Except us two
And we talk and take in the view
zh: 之后我们开始谈论附近的景色

en: All we see is sky for forever
We let the world pass by for forever
zh: 我们将世界永远的抛之脑后

en: Feels like we could go on for forever this way
zh: 就像这一刻可以维持永久

en: Two friends on a perfect day
zh: 两个好朋友，在完美的一天

en: We walk a while and talk about
The things we'll do when we get out of school
zh: 谈论我们毕业之后的理想

en: Bike the Appalachian trail or
Write a book or learn to sail
Wouldn't that be cool?
There's nothing that we can't discuss
Like girls we wish would notice us but never do
zh: 比如我们想吸引女孩子的注意，但总以失败告终

en: He looks around and says to me
zh: 他环顾四周，然后告诉我

en: "There's nowhere else I'd rather be"
zh: “再也没有哪里能与这里比拟”

en: And I say, "Me too"
zh: 我说：“我也是这么觉得的。“

en: And there he goes
Racing toward the tallest tree
From far across the yellow field I hear him calling, "Follow me"
zh: 穿过金黄的麦田，向我呼喊着

en: There we go
Wondering how the world might look from up so high
zh: 想知道从树上俯瞰的世界是什么模样

en: One foot after the other
One branch then to another
zh: 一根树枝接着一根树枝

en: I climb higher and higher
I climb till the entire
Sun shines on my face
And I suddenly feel the branch give way
I'm on the ground
My arm goes numb
I look around
And I see him come to get me
He's come to get me
And everything's okay
zh: 一切都和以前一样美好

en: I don't need you to sell me on reasons to want you
zh: 不需要你说出多么动人的理由来让我需要你

en: I don't need you to search for the proof that I should
zh: 不需要你寻找证据来证明我的选择

en: You don't have to convince me
You don't have to be scared you're not enough
'Cause what we've got going is good
zh: 因为我们现在在一起就很好

en: I don't need more reminders of all that's been broken
zh: 不需要谁来提醒我失去的所有

en: I don't need you to fix what I'd rather forget
zh: 也不需要你抹去我试图忘记的东西

en: Clear the slate and start over
zh: 只需要你扫清障碍我们从头开始

en: Try to quiet the noises in your head
zh: 忘掉你脑子里那些反对的声音

en: We can't compete with all that
zh: 否则我们战胜不了这些困难

en: So what if it's us?
zh: 如果我们注定在一起呢

en: What if it's us
And only us
And what came before won't count anymore or matter?
zh: 你我相遇之前的所有都已是过去时

en: Can we try that?
What if it's you
And what if it's me
zh: 如果你旁边的人就是我呢

en: And what if that's all that we need it to be
zh: 如果这就是命中注定呢

en: And the rest of the world falls away?
zh: 谁在乎世界是否会抛弃我们

en: What do you say?
I never thought there'd be someone like you who would want me
zh: 我从没想过会有你这样的人需要我

en: So I give you ten thousand reasons to not let me go
zh: 所以我会给出一万个理由让我留在你身边

en: But if you really see me
If you like me for me and nothing else
zh: 如果你喜欢的就是我而不为了别的

en: Well, that's all that I've wanted for longer that you could possibly know
zh: 你不会知道我对这有多渴望

en: Why should I play this game of pretend?
zh: 为何我该参与这个虚伪的游戏？

en: Remembering through a secondhand sorrow?
zh: 用别人的心如刀绞追忆你？

en: Such a great son and wonderful friend
zh: 多么完美的儿子，深厚的友谊

en: Oh, don't the tears just pour
zh: 哦，难道我不该泪流满面吗

en: I could curl up and hide in my room
There in my bed, still sobbing tomorrow
zh: 在床上独自抽泣，直到天明

en: I could give in to all of the gloom
zh: 我可以任由悲伤吞噬自己

en: But tell me, tell me what for
zh: 但请告诉我，我凭什么该如此？

en: Why should I have a heavy heart?
Why should I start to break in pieces?
Why should I go and fall apart for you?
zh: 凭什么我该为你崩溃至极？

en: Why should I play the grieving girl and lie
zh: 为什么我该装作一个柔弱悲伤的女孩

en: Saying that I miss you
zh: 谎称我多么多么的思念你

en: And that my world has gone dark without your light?
zh: 我的世界被黑暗包裹，再也看不到你的光芒

en: I will sing no requiem tonight
zh: 今晚，我不会为你唱起安魂曲

en: I gave you the world, you threw it away
zh: 我给予了你全世界，但你却抛掷脑后

en: Leaving these broken pieces behind you
zh: 只留给亲人们悲痛与心碎

en: Everything wasted, nothing to say
So I can sing no requiem
zh: 所以，我不会唱起安魂曲

en: I hear your voice, I feel you near
zh: 我听到了你的声音，感知你就在身旁

en: Within these words, I finally find you
zh: 从这字里行间我读懂了你的心

en: And now that I know that you are still here
zh: 我知道你一直在我身边

en: I will sing no requiem tonight
zh: 今晚，我不会唱起安魂曲

en: It was a February day
When your dad came by, before going away
zh: 你爸爸在离开前经过门口

en: A U-Haul truck in the driveway
zh: 一辆搬家货车在车道上

en: The day it was suddenly real
zh: 那一天突然变得如此真实

en: I told you not to come outside
But you saw that truck
zh: 但是你看见了那辆货车

en: And you smiled so wide
A real live truck in your driveway
zh: 在你人生的车道上停了一辆货车

en: We let you sit behind the wheel
Goodbye, goodbye
Now it's just me and my little guy
zh: 现在只留下我和我的小儿子

en: And the house felt so big, and I felt so small
zh: 空荡荡的房子那么大 我却觉得自己那么小

en: The house felt so big
and I felt so small
That night, I tucked you into bed
zh: 那天晚上我把你哄上床

en: I will never forget how you sat up and said
zh: 我永远不会忘记那一幕 你坐起来问我

en: "Is there another truck coming to our driveway?
zh: 会不会有另一辆货车来到我们的门前

en: A truck that will take mommy away"
And I knew there would be moments that I'd miss
zh: 我知道总有一些时刻被我错过

en: And I knew there would be space I couldn't fill
zh: 我知道总有一些空间我无法融入

en: And I knew I'd come up short a billion different ways
zh: 我知道我有百万中方式令他人失望

en: And I did
And I do
And I will
But like that February day
zh: 但就像那个二月里的日子

en: I will take your hand, squeeze it tightly and say
zh: 我会牵起你的手 紧紧地拉着 告诉你

en: There's not another truck in the driveway
Your mom isn't going anywhere
Your mom is staying right here
No matter what
I'll be here
When it all feels so big
'Til it all feels so small
I've learned to slam on the brake
Before I even turn the key
Before I make the mistake
Before I lead with the worst of me
Give them no reason to stare
No slipping up if you slip away
So I've got nothing to share
No, I got nothing to say
Step out, step out of the sun
If you keep getting burned
Because you've learned
because you've learned
On the outside always looking in
Will I ever be more than I've always been?
zh: 我的一成不变会不会有突破？

en: 'cause I'm tap, tap, tapping on the glass
zh: 因为我啪嗒，啪嗒，啪嗒轻叩玻璃

en: I'm waving through a window
I try to speak, but nobody can hear
zh: 我努力开口，却没有听众

en: So I wait around for an answer to appear
zh: 于是我四处环顾等待答案出现

en: While I'm watch, watch, watching people pass
zh: 人群来来，往往，来来从我眼前走过

en: I'm waving through a window
Oh, can anybody see
is anybody waving back at me?
zh: 有没有人在挥手给我答复？

en: We start with stars in our eyes
zh: 我们出生时眼中群星闪烁

en: We start believing that we belong
But every sun doesn't rise
And no one tells you where you went wrong
zh: 没人告诉你是哪一步走错

en: 'cause I'm tap, tap, tapping on the glass
zh: 我用手指啪嗒啪嗒点击玻璃

en: Waving through a window
While I'm watch, watch, watching people pass
zh: 我看着人们来来往往走过

en: Waving through a window
Oh, can anybody see
is anybody waving?
When you're falling in a forest
and there's nobody around
Do you ever really crash
or even make a sound
Have you ever felt like nobody was there
zh: 你是否曾经感觉没有人在你身旁

en: Have you ever felt forgotten in the middle of nowhere
zh: 你是否曾经感觉被遗忘在人山人海中

en: Have you ever felt like you could disappear
zh: 你是否曾经感觉你随时可以消失

en: Like you could fall and no one would hear
zh: 就像你的摔落无人知晓

en: Well, let that lonely feeling wash away
zh: 嗯...就让那种孤独随风逝去

en: Maybe there's a reason to believe you'll be okay
zh: 你会找到一个觉得一切会变好的理由

en: Cause when you don't feel strong enough to stand
zh: 因为你觉得自己无力站起的时候

en: You can reach, reach out your hand
zh: 你可以伸出...伸出你的手

en: And oh, someone will come running
And I know they'll take you home
zh: 然后我知道，他会带你回家

en: Even when the dark comes crashing through
zh: 即使当你的世界被黑暗吞没

en: When you need a friend to carry you
zh: 当你需要朋友携手同行

en: And when you're broken on the ground
You will be found
So let the sun come streaming in
Cause you'll reach up and you'll rise again
zh: 因为你会伸出双手，重新站起

en: Lift your head and look around
There's a place where we don't have to feel unknown
zh: 有一个地方，我们不孤独

en: And every time that you call out
You're a little less alone
If you only say the word
From across the silence
Your voice is heard
So let the sun come streaming in
zh: 所以请让阳光洒进光束

en: If you only look around
Out of the shadows
The morning is breaking
And all is new
All is new
It's filling up the empty
And suddenly I see
That all is new
To life, to life, l'chai-im
L'chai-im, l'chai-im, to life.
Here's to the father I tried to be!
zh: 这杯敬这个我努力成为的父亲！

en: Here's to my bride-to-be!
Life has a way of confusing us
zh: 生活总有办法捉弄我们

en: Blessing and bruising us.
God would like us to be joyful
zh: 上帝希望我们开开心心的

en: Even when our hearts lie panting on the floor.
zh: 即便在我们的心气喘吁吁地躺在地上

en: How much more can we be joyful
When there's really something to be joyful for?
zh: 当真正值得快乐的事情发生

en: We'll raise a glass and sip a drop of schnappes
zh: 我们一起举杯，喝一口杜松子酒

en: In honor of the great good luck that favors you.
zh: 敬一杯给那些庇护你们的好运

en: We know that when good fortune favors two such men
zh: 我们知道当你俩同时拥有好运

en: It stands to reason, we deserve it too!
zh: 那是有原因的，我们也该分享些好运,

en: To us and our good fortune
Be happy, be healthy, long life!
And if our good fortune never comes
zh: 如果我们的好运总是不来

en: Here's to whatever comes.
Drink l'chai-im, to life!
zh: 干了这杯，敬生活，敬生活

en: The window is open, so's that door
zh: 所有的门和那窗打开了

en: I didn't know they did that anymore
zh: 我真不知道他们这么做

en: Who knew we owned eight thousands salad plates?
zh: 装沙拉的盘子有八千个

en: For years I've roamed these empty halls
Why have a ballroom with no balls?
Finally they're opening up the gates
There'll be actual real live people
It'll be totally strange
Wow, am I so ready for this change
zh: 但我已准备好这转变了

en: Cuz for the first time in forever
There'll be music, there'll be light
For the first time in forever
I'll be dancing through the night
Don't know if I'm elated or gassy
zh: 不知道我有多喜气洋溢

en: But I'm somewhere in that zone
I won't be alone
Tonight imagine me gown and all
fetchingly draped against the wall
The picture of sophisticated grace
zh: 这张图画又高贵又大方

en: I suddenly see him standing there
a beautiful stranger, tall and fair
I wanna stuff some chocolate in my face
zh: 我想把所有巧克力吃光

en: But then we laugh and talk all evening
Which is totally bizarre
Nothing like the life I've led so far
There'll be magic, there'll be fun
I could be noticed by someone
And I know it's totally crazy
zh: 我知道我是有一些疯狂

en: To dream I'd find romance
But for the first time in forever
At least I've got a chance
Don't let them in, don't let them see
Be the good girl you always have to be
zh: 做好女孩就像你的从前

en: Conceal, don't feel, put on a show
Make one wrong move and everyone will know
zh: 一出错会让所有人发现

en: I'm getting what I'm dreaming of
A chance to change my lonely world
A chance to find true love
I know it all ends tomorrow
So it has to be today
Nothing's in my way!
The snow glows white on the mountain tonight
zh: 白雪发亮 今夜铺满山上

en: Not a footprint to be seen
A kingdom of isolation
and it looks like I'm the Queen
The wind is howling like this swirling storm inside
zh: 风在呼啸 像心里的风暴一样

en: Couldn't keep it in, heaven knows I've tried
zh: 只有天知道 我受过的伤

en: Be the good girl You always have to be
zh: 做好女孩 就像你的从前

en: Conceal, don't feel, Don't let them know
zh: 躲藏 不让他们看见

en: Well, now they know
Let it go, Let it go
Can't hold it back anymore
Turn away and slam the door
I don't care
What they're going to say
Let the storm rage on
The cold never bothered me anyway
zh: 反正冰天雪地我也不怕

en: It's funny how some distance
Makes everything seem small
And the fears that once controlled me
Can't get to me at all
It's time to see what I can do
To test the limits and break through
No right, no wrong, no rules for me, I'm free
zh: 不分对错 没有底线 向前

en: I am one with the wind and sky
You'll never see me cry
Here I stand, And here I'll stay
My power flurries through the air into the ground
zh: 我力量从空气中扩散到地上

en: My soul is spiraling in frozen fractals all around
zh: 我灵魂盘旋在冰块各种不同形状

en: And one thought crystallizes like an icy blast
zh: 我思想结晶变成锋利的闪光

en: I'm never going back, The past is in the past
zh: 我永不回头看 以往会被埋葬

en: And I'll rise like the break of dawn
That perfect girl is gone
Here I stand in the light of day
zh: 这个家 在阳光之下

en: Where the north wind meets the sea
There's a river full of memory
zh: 有一条河 充满着回忆

en: Sleep, my darling, safe and sound
For in this river all is found
In her waters, deep and true
Lie the answers and a path for you
Dive down deep into her sound
But not too far or you'll be drowned
Yes, she will sing to those who'll hear
And in her song, all magic flows
But can you brave what you most fear?
Can you face what the river knows?
There's a mother full of memory
Come, my darling, homeward bound
When all is lost, then all is found
zh: 曾失去的 终会找到

en: Again you're gone
Off on a different path than mine
I'm left behind
Wondering if I should follow
You had to go
And of course it's always fine
I probably could catch up with you tomorrow
zh: 也许明天能跟上你的节奏

en: But is this what it feels like,To be growing apart
zh: 这是否代表了我们在分叉路口

en: When did I become the one,Who's always chasing your heart
zh: 到底我要追逐你的心到什么时候

en: Now I turn around and find
I am lost in the woods
North is south right is left
When you're gone
I'm the one who sees you home
But now I'm lost in the woods
And I don't know what path you are on
I'm lost in the woods
The next step was a question of how
I never thought it was a question of whether
zh: 我从未想过这到底应不应该

en: Who am I if I'm not your guy
Where am I if we're not together
Forever
Now I know you're my true north
'Cause I am lost in the woods
Up is down day is night
When you're not there
Oh you're my only landmark
So I'm lost in the woods
Wondering if you still care
But I'll wait
For a sign
That I'm your path
'Cause you are mine
Yes the wind blows a little bit colder
zh: 四季变化 天气也凉快了

en: And we're all getting older
And the clouds are moving on with every autumn breeze
zh: 看那白云飘过 是那秋风吹送着

en: Peter Pumpkin just became fertilizer
zh: 南瓜一个个都变肥料了

en: And my leaf's a little sadder and wiser
zh: 叶子谢了 我的智慧变多了

en: That's why I rely on certain certainties
zh: 所以我相信 一切都安排好

en: some things never change
Like the feel of your hand in mine
Some things stay the same
Like how we get along just fine
Like an old stone wall that'll never fall
zh: 像坚固的墙 能对抗时间

en: Some things are always true
Some things never change
Like how I'm holding on tight to you
The leaves are already falling
Sven it feels like the future is calling
zh: 我觉得未来计划要实现

en: Are you telling me tonight you're gonna get down on one knee
zh: 那你今晚是不是准备好 那求婚惊喜

en: Yeah bud I'm really bad at planning these things out
zh: 但是我实在太笨 不知怎么做

en: Like candlelight and pulling of rings out
zh: 何时把戒指拿出最好呢

en: Maybe you should leave all the romantic stuff to me
zh: 请把关于浪漫的事全都交给我

en: Yeah some things never change
Like the love that I feel for her
Like how reindeers are easier
But if I commit and I go for it
zh: 如果要决定 就勇往直前

en: I'll know what to say and do
Right
Sven the pressure is all on you
zh: 斯特 压力全在你肩

en: The winds are restless
Could that be why I'm hearing this call
Is something coming
I'm not sure I want things to change at all
zh: 还是我不想改变得太多

en: These days are precious
Can't let them slip away
I can't freeze this moment
But I can still go out and seize this day
zh: 但我的未来要自己把握

en: The wind blows a little bit colder
zh: 四季变化 天气也凉了

en: And you all look a little bit older
zh: 我们也都一天天长大了

en: It's time to count our blessings
Beneath an autumn sky
We'll always live in a kingdom of plenty
zh: 在我们这里什么都有很多

en: That stands for the good and the many
And I promise you the flag of Arendelle will always fly
zh: 我会保证阿伦黛尔的旗帜永不坠落

en: Some things never change
Turn around and the time has flown
Though the future remains unknown
May our good luck last
May our past be past
Time's moving fast it's true
And I'm holding on tight to you
I've seen dark before
But not like this
This is cold
This is empty
This is numb
The life I knew is over
The light's are out
Hello darkness
I'm ready to succumb
I follow you around,I always have
zh: 我总在你身边 一直都在

en: But you've gone to a place I cannot find
zh: 你去了我找不到的地方

en: This grief has a gravity,It pulls me down
zh: 悲伤 像地心引力拖我下沉

en: But a tiny voice whispers in my mind
zh: 但有个声音，它对我呼唤

en: You are lost hope is gone
But you must go on
And do the next right thing
Can there be a day beyond this night
I don't know anymore what is true
zh: 看不清 是虚幻或真实

en: I can't find my direction I'm all alone
zh: 找不到我的方向 孤独无助

en: The only star that guided me was you
zh: 你是那星光指引我的路

en: How to rise from the floor
When it's not you I'm rising for
Just do the next right thing
Take a step step again
It is all that I can to do
The next right thing
I won't look too far ahead
It's too much for me to take
But break it down to this next breath
This next step, This next choice is one that I can make
zh: 下一步选的路是自己的主张

en: So I'll walk through this night
Stumbling blindly toward the light
And with the dawn what comes then
When it's clear that everything will never be the same again
zh: 我知道，当一切情况不再跟从前一样

en: Then I'll make the choice
To hear that voice
In the eye of a hurricane
There is quiet
For just a moment
A yellow sky
When I was seventeen a hurricane
Destroyed my town
I didn't drown
I couldn't seem to die
I wrote my way out
Wrote everything down far as I could see
zh: 把目所能及的生灵涂炭，写成篇章

en: I looked up and the town had its eyes on me
zh: 我抬头，看见了家乡对我的注目

en: They passed a plate around
Total strangers
Moved to kindness by my story
Raised enough for me to book passage on a
Ship that was New York bound
I wrote my way out of hell
zh: 我的文笔让我逃离了地狱

en: I wrote my way to revolution
zh: 我的文笔谱写了革命的辉煌

en: I was louder than the crack in the bell
zh: 我呼喊的能量 比自由之钟更强

en: I wrote Eliza love letters until she fell
zh: 我写了绵绵情书 终获Eliza的芳心

en: I wrote about The Constitution and defended it well
zh: 宪法威严得以捍卫，也因我写下的浩瀚篇章

en: And in the face of ignorance and resistance
zh: 顶着重重的无知与阻力

en: I wrote financial systems into existence
zh: 我将金融系统谱写于世上

en: And when my prayers to God were met with indifference
zh: 当我的祷告遭到上帝的冷遇

en: I picked up a pen, I wrote my own deliverance
zh: 我拿起笔, 写出自我救赎的方向

en: My grandfather was a fire and brimstone preacher
But there are things that the Homilies and hymns won't teach ya
zh: 可是也有些东西是讲道和圣歌中未提及的

en: My mother was a genius
My father commanded respect
When they died they left no instructions
zh: 他们过世前没来得及留下任何话

en: Just a legacy to protect
zh: 只留下沉重的家族名誉让我守护

en: Death doesn't discriminate
Between the sinners and the saints
It takes and it takes and it takes
zh: 死亡一味索取人的青春、活力和性命

en: And we keep living anyway
We rise and we fall And we break
And we make our mistakes
And if there's a reason I'm still alive
When everyone who loves me has died
zh: 即便爱我的人都已不在

en: I'm willing to wait for it
I'm willing to wait for it
I am the one thing in life I can control
Wait for it Wait for it
I am inimitable
I am an original
Hamilton faces an endless uphill climb
zh: 汉密尔顿还在奋力攀登高不可及的山峰

en: He has something to prove
He has nothing to lose
Hamilton's pace is relentless
zh: 汉密尔顿肆无忌惮向前冲

en: He wastes no time
What is it like in his shoes?
zh: 做汉密尔顿是什么滋味？

en: On my own
Pretending he's beside me
All alone
I walk with him till morning
Without him
I feel his arms around me
And when I lose my way I close my eyes
And he has found me
In the rain the pavement shines like silver
All the lights are misty in the river
In the darkness, the trees are full of starlight
And all I see is him and me forever and forever
And I know it's only in my mind
zh: 心知肚明，只是一厢情愿

en: That I'm talking to myself and not to him
zh: 自言自语，而非与其倾谈

en: And although I know that he is blind
zh: 虽然自知，我不在他眼中

en: Still I say, there's a way for us
zh: 仍然自欺，我们还未缘尽

en: I love him
But when the night is over
He is gone
The river's just a river
The world around me changes
The trees are bare and everywhere
The streets are full of strangers
But every day I'm learning
zh: 但每日，我都更清晰地意识到

en: All my life
I've only been pretending
Without me
His world would go on turning
A world that's full of happiness
That I have never known
I was cheated by you And I think you know when.
zh: 我还记得当年 莫名被你欺骗

en: So I made up my mind, it must come to an end
zh: 我还记得那天 离开你的身边

en: Look at me now, will I ever learn?
zh: 看看现在 变成什么样

en: I don't know how but I suddenly lose control
zh: 我不明白 这种不安分的心跳

en: There's a fire within my soul
Just one look and I can hear a bell ring
zh: 一眨眼我看见你在微笑

en: One more look and I forget everything
zh: 一瞬间我的心开始燃烧

en: Thank you for the music
The songs I'm singing
Thanks for all the joy
They're bringing
Who can live without it I ask in all honesty
What would life be
Without a song or a dance what are we?
So I say thank you for the music
zh: 我感谢 歌声让我飞翔

en: For giving it to me
Mother says I was A dancer before I could walk
zh: 妈妈说我跳着舞向这世界问候

en: She says I began To sing long before I could talk
zh: 用歌声唱出对生命最初的感受

en: And I've often wondered How did it all start?
zh: 是谁把那旋律，带到我身旁

en: Who found out that nothing
zh: 让我的心陶醉在歌声飞扬

en: Can capture a heart Like a melody can?
Well who ever it was, I'm a fan
Hear me now, O thou bleak and unbearable world
zh: 听好，尔这堕落难忍的世界

en: Thou art base and debauched as can be
And a knight with his banners all bravely unfurled
zh: 我这骑士大旗勇敢地飞扬

en: Now hurls down his gauntlet to thee!
I am I, Don Quixote, the Lord of La Mancha
zh: 我就是我，堂吉诃德，拉曼查的领主

en: My destiny calls and I go
And the wild winds of fortune will carry me onward
zh: 幸运的狂飙会策我向前

en: Oh, whithersoever they blow
Whithersoever they blow, onward to glory I go
zh: 任他风吹雨打，向荣誉进发！

en: I'm Sancho, yes, I'm Sancho
I'll follow my master till the end
I'll tell all the world proudly
zh: 我要拍胸脯告诉全世界

en: I'm his squire, I'm his friend
zh: 我是他的侍从、我是他的弟兄

en: Hear me heathens and wizards and serpents of sin
zh: 听好，野人、巫师、罪恶的爬虫

en: All your dastardly doings are past
zh: 你们的蝇营狗苟已成历史

en: For a holy endeavor is now to begin
And virtue shall triumph at last
To dream the impossible dream
To fight the unbeatable foe
To bear with unbearable sorrow
To run where the brave dare not go;
To right the unrightable wrong.
To love, pure and chaste, from afar
zh: 远远地去爱，纯真高洁的心

en: To try, when your arms are too weary
To reach the unreachable star!
This is my Quest to follow that star
zh: 敢以此生 求索那颗星

en: No matter how hopeless, no matter how far
zh: 管它征途遥远，道路多险峻

en: To fight for the right
Without question or pause
To be willing to march into hell
For a heavenly cause!
And I know, if I'll only be true
To this glorious Quest
That my heart will lie peaceful and calm
When I'm laid to my rest.
And the world will be better for this
That one man, scorned and covered with scars
Still strove, with his last ounce of courage
zh: 仍要用伤痕累累的双手

en: To reach the unreachable stars!
Never again will she get the best of me
zh: 她再也不能利用最好的我

en: Never again will she take away my freedom
zh: 她再也不能带走我的自由

en: And we won't forget the day we fought for the right
zh: 我们永远不会忘记为自己权利而奋斗的那天

en: To be a little bit naughty.
Never again, will the chokey door slam.
zh: 密室的门再也不会被粗暴地关上

en: Never again, will I be bullied and
Never again will I doubt it when my mummy says I'm a miracle.
zh: 当妈妈说我是个奇迹的时候将不再会有疑问

en: We are revolting children, living in revolting times
zh: 我们是叛逆的孩子，生活在叛逆的年代

en: We sing revolting songs, using revolting rhymes.
zh: 我们唱着叛逆的歌曲，用着叛逆的韵脚

en: We'll be revolting children til our revoltings done
zh: 我们都是叛逆的孩子，直到我们成功的那一刻

en: And we'll have the Trunchbull bolting, we're REVOLTING!
zh: 我们将打败Trunchbull，我们正在反抗！

en: We will become a screaming hoard.
Take out your hockey sticks and use it as a sword.
zh: 拿出球杆像剑一样挥舞

en: Never again will we be ignored.
We'll find out where the chalk is stored
And draw rude pictures on the board.
When I grow up
I will be brave enough to fight the creatures
zh: 我就能勇敢地挑战那些

en: That you have to fight beneath the bed
zh: 小时候把我吓得躲进床底下的怪兽

en: Each night to be a grown up.
zh: 因为我们每晚都是大人

en: Just because you find that life's not fair
zh: 若你只是觉得生活不公平

en: it doesn't mean that you just have to grin and bear it!
zh: 那并不意味着你必须要微笑着忍受

en: If you always take it on the chin and wear it
Nothing will change.
Just because I find myself in this story
zh: 若我只是觉得我被困在这故事里

en: It doesn't mean that everything is written for me.
zh: 这并不意味着我的命运已被决定

en: If I think the ending is fixed already
zh: 如果认为我的结局已经注定

en: I might as well be saying I think that it's OK
zh: 我也许就会说，这样也不错

en: And that's not right!
They're the perfect Loving family so adoring And I love them
zh: 这是世上最和睦的完美一家

en: Every day of every week
zh: 每一个成员都可爱又听话

en: So my son's a little jerk My husband's boring
zh: 我的儿子是混蛋我丈夫无聊

en: And my daughter Though a genius is a freak
zh: 女儿算个天才却是个怪咖

en: Still I help them Love each other
Father mother Sister brother
zh: 爸爸 妈妈 妹妹 哥哥

en: Cheek to cheek
Natalie it's four in the morning is everything ok
zh: 娜塔莉 都四点了 你没事吧

en: If they love each other Or if they just fake it
zh: 他们真的相爱还是都是装的

en: And if other daughter Feel like I feel too
zh: 女儿是否都迷茫得就像我

en: 'Cause some days I think I'm dying
But I'm really only Trying to get through
zh: 可我其实只是挣扎着想活

en: For just another day
For another stolen hour
When the world will Feel my power and obey
zh: 整个世界都臣服在我面前

en: It's just another day
Feeling like I'll live forever
Feeling like this feeling never goes away
zh: 感觉这种感觉永不会改变

en: When it's up to you To hold your house together
zh: 整个家的重量都在你的手中

en: A house you built with Patience and with care
zh: 用爱支撑起他们的生活

en: But you're grappling with That grey and rainy weather
zh: 可你自己冒着每个糟糕天气

en: And you're living on a latte And a prayer
zh: 靠着咖啡和祈祷勉强度过

en: In the hustle and the hurry
You want to wipe Your worry clean away
zh: 想让担忧比昨天更少一些

en: I will keep the Plates all spinning
With a smile so white And winning all the way
zh: 带着微笑一路冲杀着往前

en: 'Cause what doesn't kill me Doesn't kill me
zh: 闯过一关就是过了一关

en: So fill me up For just another day
zh: 扶我起来就能再战一天

en: It only hurts when I breathe
It only hurts when I try
It only hurts when I think
It only hurts when I cry
It only hurts when I work
It only hurts when I play
It only hurts when I move
It's just another day a busy busy day
And the morning sun Is stunning
I will hold it all together
And you wish that you Were running far away
zh: 依旧渴望能够逃到很遥远

en: I will hide the mess away
It's just another day
and I'll survive another day
Birds are singing Things are growing
zh: 万物生长 飞鸟盘旋

en: And I will pray To hold on
zh: 我愿就这样坚持着往前

en: And you wish You could be going But you stay and you stay
zh: 你想走 却一寸都无法往前

en: And stay forever and for my family's sake
Every day is just another
And another and another
zh: 又是一天 又是一天

en: I will hold it all together
We're the perfect loving family
The perfect loving family
I will keep the plates all spinning
And the world just keeps on spinning
And I think the house is spinning
Maybe I've lost it at last
Maybe my last lucid moment has passed
zh: 也许我只剩黝黯的未来

en: I'm dancing with death, I suppose
But really who knows?
Maybe I'm tired of the game
Of coming up short of the rules of the shame
zh: 也许我厌倦了再听从安排

en: And maybe you feel that way too
I see me in you
A girl full of anger and hope
A girl with a mother who just couldn't cope
zh: 一样承受母亲的痛和懈怠

en: A girl who felt caught and thought no one could see
zh: 一样被困住 觉得没人在乎

en: That maybe one day she'll be free
It's so lovely that you're sharing
No really I'm all ears
But where has all this caring been for sixteen years?
zh: 但为什么这关怀迟到了十六年

en: For all those years I'd prayed that you'd go away for good
zh: 多少次我曾祈祷 你能消失不见

en: Half the time afraid that you really would
zh: 又多少次怕你真的走远

en: When I thought you might be dying
I cried for all we've never be
zh: 我为失去的未来流过泪

en: But there'll be no more crying, not for me
We tried to give you a normal life
zh: 我们太想给你正常的生活了

en: I realize now I have no clue what that is
zh: 但现在我才明白 我根本不知道什么才叫做正常

en: I don't need a life that's normal, that's way too far away
zh: 我不需要一切正常 那太不可思议

en: But something next to normal would be okay
zh: 只要它近乎正常 我就可以

en: Yeah, something next to normal
That's the thing I'd like to try
Close enough to normal to get by
We'll get by
Do you wake up in the morning And need help to lift your head
zh: 难道你也清早醒来不能自己爬下床

en: Do you read obituaries And feel jealous of the dead
zh: 难道你也读着悼文嫉妒死人到发狂

en: It's like living on a cliffside Not knowing when you'll dive
zh: 就像挂在悬崖边缘不知何时手会松

en: Do you know Do you know
What it's like to die alive
When a world that once had color Fades to white and grey and black
zh: 当曾经缤纷的世界褪色变成黑和白

en: When tomorrow terrifies you But you'll die if you look back
zh: 当回忆能让你窒息却更怕明天到来

en: You don't know
I know you don't know
You say that you're hurting It sure doesn't show
zh: 你说你也痛 我完全看不到

en: It lays me so low
When you say let go And I say

en: in sleep he sang to me
in dreams he came
that voice which calls to me and speaks my name
and do I dream again?
for now I find
the phantom of the opera is there
inside my mind
sing once again with me
our strange duet
my power over you
grows stronger yet
and though you turn from me
to glance behind
inside your mind
those who have seen your face
draw back in fear
I am the mask you wear
it's me they hear
my spirit and my voice
in one combined
inside my mind

why couldn't you have stayed calm for once. Instead of flying off the handle

come with me

who isn't less fortunate than I?

from becoming popu-ler... lar...

en: I remind them on their own they have

en: Did they have brains or knowledge?
Don't make me laugh!

like ME!
